title: feat: upgrade TTS from eleven_multilingual_v2 to eleven_v3
author: voodoohop

gist.summary: Upgraded the text-to-speech engine to ElevenLabs v3, unlocking richer emotional expression and support for over 70 languages.
gist.impact: Users can now generate more natural speech with audio tags like [laughing] or [crying] for dynamic storytelling.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee as a voice actor or podcaster. Key symbols: retro microphone, headphones, speech bubbles with emotional icons (laughing/crying faces). Represents the new emotional range of the TTS engine.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee wearing headphones and speaking into a retro microphone, surrounded by floating pixel speech bubbles showing laughing and crying expressions. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
